mapper.select: select goods_code goodsCode, goods_name goodsName, isbn isbn, introduce goodsDescribe, selling_price goodsPrice, goods_image goodsImagePath, rating_star goodsEvaluateScore, author goodsAuthor, press goodsPress from t_sys_goods where is_delete = 0 and goods_code = #{goodsCode}
select sort_code classifyId, sort_name classifyName from t_goods_sort where is_delete = 0 and parent_code = 0 order by create_time DESC

select t1.sort_code classifyId, t1.sort_name classifyName, t2.goods_code goodsCode, t2.goods_name goodsName, t2.goods_image goodsImagePath, t2.selling_price goodsPrice from t_goods_sort t1 LEFT JOIN t_sys_goods t2 ON (t1.sort_code = t2.second_sort_id and t2.is_delete =0) where t1.is_delete = 0 and t1.parent_code = #{classifyId} order by t2.create_time DESC
